name: Professor Anil Madhavapeddy
title: Professor of Planetary Computing
affiliation: Department of Computer Science and Technology, Cambridge University
endorsement: Chris Smith brings exactly the kind of leadership Cambridge needs in challenging times. His experience in government, commitment to sustainability, and deep understanding of university governance make him the ideal Chancellor.

name: Dr Rebecca Laemmle
title: Associate Professor of Classics

name: Angus Ivory
title: President of Pembroke Junior Parlour (JCR)

name: Sandra Fuhrmann

endorsement: Lord Smith represents the progressive leadership we need to ensure Cambridge remains at the forefront of global education and research.

name: Daniel Gerring

name: Dame Sue Owen

endorsement: Chris Smith's deep understanding of both Cambridge and the broader policy landscape makes him an outstanding choice for Chancellor. His advocacy for education and research is exactly what we need.
